title: Book Bolt Keyword Search Tutorial | Earn Passive Income on Amazon KDP With Low & Medium Content Book

tactics.name: Keyword Search Optimization
tactics.description: Use longer tail keywords for more specific search results
steps: Enter a keyword into Book Bolt Studio's keyword search
Analyze Amazon and Google keyword results
Check BSR metrics and competition scores
caveats: Broad terms like 'coloring book' yield less actionable data
source_quotes: the broader your search term, the less likely you're going to get good results

tactics.name: Keyword Search Niche Targeting
tactics.description: Use Book Bolt Studio's keyword search to identify low-competition, high-demand phrases by analyzing search volume, CPC, and competition scores.
steps: Filter for medium-low competition scores (C grades)
Evaluate sales volume and keyword popularity in top-selling books
caveats: Avoid overly broad terms like 'coloring book' without modifiers
source_quotes: 'Corgi coloring book. Let's say you wanted to do a corgi themed coloring book. You will have some competition.'

tactics.name: Book Bolt Trial
tactics.description: Sign up for Book Bolt's three-day free trial
source_quotes: Um, and if you want to sign up for Book Bolt, they do have a three freeday trial. And if you want to pay for it, um, you can use my affiliate link.

heuristics.name: BSR Indication Heuristic
heuristics.condition: If average BSR exceeds 1,000,000, flag as low sales potential
source_quotes: average BSR over a million means it's not really moving very fast

heuristics.name: Long-Tail Keyword Optimization
heuristics.condition: If a keyword has a medium competition score but high sales volume, prioritize it for niche targeting
source_quotes: 'C means that there is um a good amount of competition... but on the upside, see how um sales volume 267.'

claims.statement: Search volume does not equate to sales volume
source_quotes: sales volume is not the same as search volume

claims.statement: Book Bolt Studio's keyword search feature shows related phrases and their popularity metrics for Amazon KDP optimization
source_quotes: 'This is the keyword search feature for um within Bookbolt Studio.'

niche_patterns.example: adult coloring book + stress relief + mindfulness
niche_patterns.description: Combines specific audience needs with practical limitations
niche_patterns.why_it_works: Targets underserved niches with lower competition
source_quotes: the first book that is somewhat closely relevant to that keyword

niche_patterns.description: Combine niche themes with targeted demographics to reduce competition while maintaining search volume
niche_patterns.why_it_works: Adds specificity to keywords, improving relevance without sacrificing search demand
source_quotes: 'adult corgi coloring book just for good measure. Let's see what the competition is like.'
